Author: tholin
Content:
I took that make_gds script from the wafer.space logo IP in the project template and updated it to make it more compatible with a wider range of inputs.
https://github.com/AvalonSemiconductors/ws-submission-2025/blob/main/silicon_art/make_gds.py

Author: tholin
Content: The input image no longer has to be in a specific pixel format.

Author: tholin
Content: But most importantly, I added code to automatically repair potential DRC errors.

Author: tholin
Content:
Most common are pixels that only touch at the corner:
```
X_  _X
_X  X_
```

Author: tholin
Content: But one-pixel gaps are also filled on lower pixel sizes.

Author: tholin
Content: The script now inserts additional pixels until all such errors are gone.

Author: tholin
Content: Which is just a little hint to everyone that I‚Äôm about to have a need for converting more complex images to layouts.
